title: Campaign Builder
subtitle: e-Commerce Marketing Template
technologyUsed: sql with headless CMS (Directus) & Terminal access
description: A dynamic campaign template for marketing products built using React & Express & Directus to manage the database and host the API. A 2-part application, this template allows the creation of multiple campaigns which become referenced at domain.com/<CAMPAIGN>. The campaign creator can add products of multiple categories, branding media & even add a theme color.

title: Picki
subtitle: Restaurant Locator
technologyUsed: Express.js with handlebars for templating (pre-React). Yelp API for data collection.
description: A restaurant locator & review platform which allows users to add emojis to symbolize reviews. This application utilizes the Yelp API to retrieve the information. This was a school project where I utilized touch-controls for mobile (AKA swiping between restaurants.

title: GIF Search
subtitle: Giphy API Engine
description: A complete front-end application, this was my first project utilizing axios to manage APIs. I experimented with the giphy queries to allow the user to change the gif rating (G-R) & the quantity of gifs to return.

title: Reactive Shapes
subtitle: Animated Memory Game
description: A simple memory game involving randomized colors & shapes. If the user clicks the same shape they have already clicked, the game is over. This game is built on React, and involves SVG animation to provide a seamless, fast responsive animation.

title: Brown Sales
subtitle: e-Commerce Marketing Template
technologyUsed: sql with headless CMS (Directus) & Terminal access
description: Brown Sales, the client for this project, wanted a website where clients can view clearance products before heading to the store to order. Since the client wanted to have a CMS where they could add/remove products as they saw fit, Contentful was an excellent headless option for them.
